title: The World Is Producing More Food than Ever—but Not for Long
summary: – Climate change isn't just bad news for farmers, it's bad news for everyone who eats. According to a new study published in Nature, six key staple crops will see an 11.2 percent decline in harvests by the end of the century, compared to a world without warming, reports the New York Times. title: Scientists turn beer yeast into mini factories for smart drugs
